name: Cookie monster saga
description:
Explore 83 challenging levels in the magical world of the Cookie monster saga!

Match the ingredients up and complete the tasks on every level!
A fantastic game with stunning graphics and effects.

Defeat the ginger bread cookies and defeat the waffles and many other excitement tasks along the long way to the final level.
Earn magical power ups to ease the game up a bit for you as you play through different worlds in this stunning match 3 or more game.

This is by far one of the most challenging game we made with great music and playful design wich will appeal to any age to play, regardless if you are young or old, Cookie monster saga is the only match3 puzzle and mind challenging game you will ever need.
